mapper.select: select rs.id,rs.create_time,rs.name,rs.url,rs.description,rs.category_id from ums_admin_role_relation ar inner join ums_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id inner join ums_role_resource_relation rr ON r.id = rr.role_id inner join ums_resource rs ON rr.resource_id = rs.id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId} and rs.id is not null
select distinct ar.admin_id from ums_role_resource_relation rr left join ums_admin_role_relation ar on rr.role_id = ar.role_id where rr.resource_id=#{resourceId}
select r.id,r.name,r.description,r.admin_count,r.create_time,r.status,r.sort from ums_admin_role_relation ar left join ums_role r on ar.role_id = r.id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId}
